name: The Radical Tea Towel Company
tag_list: tea-towel, apron, greetings-cards, politics, philosophy, gift-cards, inspiration
overview: The Radical Tea Towel Company offers a range of kitchenware gifts with a radical twist. The business sells novelty tea towels, aprons, shopper bags and greetings cards sourced from ethical UK suppliers, through their eCommerce website www.radicalteatowel.com . The products have political, philosophical and inspirational themes, using images and quotations from some of history’s most radical thinkers, including Gandhi, Mandela, Anarchism, Feminism, Einstein on Vegetarianism, Che Guevara, Thomas Paine, Martin Luther King, Wilberforce and Democratic Presidents of the 20th Century.
